title: Costa!! de serie
overview: On the Spanish Costa Brava, the legendary club Costa is running at full speed again. However, success also means hard work and club owner Thomas is on the verge of burnout. When the doctor warns that he really needs to take it easy, permanent employees Esmee, Kay and Mike have to take over the management of the Costa. But then a neighbor and the municipality turn against the club and the team is once again faced with the big challenge of saving club Costa.
